price: Sungguh, orang-orang munafik itu (ditempatkan) pada tingkatan yang paling bawah dari neraka. Dan kamu tidak akan mendapat seorang penolong pun bagi mereka,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ فِي ٱلدَّرۡكِ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-munāfiqīna fī al-darki al-asfali mina al-nāri walan tajida lahum naṣīran
